title: Detective Conan OVA 11: A Secret Order from London
title_jp: 名探偵コナン ～ロンドンからの㊙指令 (ロンドンからのマル秘指令)
synopsis: Diana invites Kogorou and Ran to London, but since Conan cannot travel with his invented name, Ai gives him a temporary antidote, letting him travel as Kudou Shin'ichi. Together with Professor Agasa they are on a plane to London.
